generated_text:
- sidewalk: The image shows a paved pedestrian area with people walking, bordered by buildings and trees, which is characteristic of a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and commercial signage are visible along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present on the right side of the image and also along the street.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including a man and two women in the foreground.
- car: A red sedan is parked on the right side of the street.
- truck: A white truck is parked on the left side of the street.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked against a railing on the right side of the image.
- pole: A metal pole is visible near the bicycles on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A white sign with blue text and a picture is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- wall: A concrete wall with a railing is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the stairs.
